column5: Center Island sits in Lake O i was just wondering would it be Section 4 or Section 8?? I am asking this question in regards to pike opener on center island.
Its in section 8 pike opener is sat may 5
Thanks! I was just making sure every time i look at the map regulations its hard to determine if its 4 or 8.
No problem i'll be there early saturday morning trying for my first pike and or some carp.
yup, i had same question, but now heres a tricky one, what division is the waterfront in? lol, im going to the islands saturday, cant wait
It's not what you are standing on...but what you are casting into.
what time you guys heading to the islands?
Should be there first thing in the morning i'll be the big bald guy see ya there

As a side topic still regarding Centre Islands,  are they considered part of Toronto Harbour and require a harbour License? I always wanted to give them a try, but don't want to bother having to get a harbour license.  If they aren't, where would be the best place to launch to avoid the harbour?
The islands are part of the harbour and would require a harbour license
